summary:
A HR mod that replaces firewood, choppingblock, tree rings and stump.
version 1.21
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ee9a4e]v1.21
- changed color on stump, firewood, lumbercuts, and tree rings
- slightly increased lightness[/color]

[i]NEW screenshots are available for preview !![/i]




[b][size=3]*********************
  About
*********************[/size][/b]

All textures are done from scratch.
Image source for wood rings was large enough so no upscaling was done, resulting in a very nice image @2048x2048
Other details were painted on.

Tree bark that was used for screenshoots is from [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3812]Segs HD tree project[/url]

Image source for wood rings, planks, chopping block was found on google and other texture related sites.
 

[b][size=3]*********************
 How to Install
*********************[/size][/b]

copy content of rar file to ..\\Skyrim folder ( where TESV.exe file is !!)
or use Nexus Mod Manager




Mod used in screenshots:
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4323]Realistic Lighting Without Post-Processing[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1875]Realistic Colors and Real Nights v13 with HDR[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=141]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=711]RWT Realistic Water Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2146]Serious HD Retexture Landscape Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=607]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3812]Segs HD tree project[/url]



This is my first mod so any suggestions, creative comments and question are welcome.

I hope you\'ll enjoy this mod !

...and don\'t forget to endorse ;)










update log:

v1.2
- redone all textures
- added more dirt to firewood and stump
- wood looks more aged
- increased lightness to crust and replaced its texture with new one
- replaced chopping block side texture with new one
...and many more details

_______________________________________________________________________

v1.1 (merged with v1.2)
- tree rings on tree stump (added more rings to reflect age)
- added more dirt and added some more details on lumber
- increased crust ring to a bit lighter brown
- reduced saturation on lumber and tree rings
_______________________________________________________________________
author: QuantumShell
